title: Separatist Indian movement’s Twitter bots spread violent messages
description: Backers of the Khalistani movement are using multiple networks of linked accounts to blast out videos and calls for action simultaneously, before Twitter’s reduced safety staff can respond.

title: You can get better sleep with wearables. Just focus on the right data.
description: Popular body-worn gadgets such as smartwatches and rings have features to help you understand your sleep. Here's our closer look at the data they provide and how much of it is actually helpful.

title: There are almost no legal protections for the internet’s child stars
description: A growing movement is pushing for Congress to pass laws to protect child influencers similar to those that cover child actors.
